imgs.text: San Juan 21 Mk II photo on sailboatdata.com
San Juan Mk II drawing on sailboatdata.com

name: SAN JUAN 21-2
notes: The SAN JUAN MARK II was introduced in 1974 after nearly 1000 of the earlier versions had been built. With the MARK II, is essentially a raised deck version of the MARK I with the companionway moved aft to allow for more interior space. Both Mark I and Mark II were produced concurrently, until the last of the regular run Mark Iï¿½s was produced in 1977.
